actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5042 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption from tax for certain wines produced for personal use.

summary.text: Provides an exemption from the alcohol excise tax under the Internal Revenue Code for up to 100 gallons per year of wine produced for personal use and not for sale by individuals 18 years of age or older.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5042 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption from tax for certain wines produced for personal use.
